TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to James F Perry, 12-19-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to James F. Perry, December 19, 1830. Instructions for journey to Texas. Must indenture his slaves. Needs Perry to take charge of his personal business.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, December 19, 1830. Instructions for journey to Texas. Must indenture his slaves. Needs Perry to take charge of his personal business.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-19-1830">Decr. 19 [18] 30*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I wrote you a day or so since and improve another opportunity— your goods by the Nelson arrived safe *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* came up *date_mentioned n="12-18-1830">yesterday */date_mentioned*and had stored them all up in good order— Nothing will be opened untill *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*arrives-— I shall have to use up some of the nails to finish the *location_mentioned*store house*/location_mentioned*- I have all the Shingles and all the weather boarding on the ground the plank for the [mutilated] and the sheeting for the roof will [be ready in] a few days. The frame is up so that [the building will be] all ready by the time *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*arrives he can get the goods up— I think a small assortment of goods would do at the *location_mentioned*Mouth of Trinity*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I am very anxious for you to get here, I shall be as poor as I now am without you, as long as I live— I need some one to take care of my money matters, and I w[ant you] to take all the Stock I can collect and manage the whole of that business— I think that you had better build *location_mentioned*on the lots of mine above *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*on the Creek*/location_mentioned*, or if you prefer *location_mentioned*town */location_mentioned*I have a *location_mentioned*whole square fronting on the South west side of Constitution Square—*/location_mentioned*or you can get out *location_mentioned*lots and building lots from the *person_mentioned*Ayto */person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*do as you please in this matter and use my *location_mentioned*lots */location_mentioned*if you want them—- The *location_mentioned*League of land above town*/location_mentioned*, is mine, there are fine situations on it for a *location_mentioned*stock farm*/location_mentioned* it is nearly all *location_mentioned*prairie*/location_mentioned*, only timber for fire wood. I have bought the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Dickenson*/person_mentioned* League on Clear Creek*/location_mentioned*, for you if you want it—the title is in my name, but if I die before I get back you will get it in another way, my will— I have appointed *person_mentioned*you and Lessasier and Williams my executors—*/person_mentioned*the first is a *person_mentioned*Lawyer */person_mentioned*and can be use full in [settlin]g the estate and *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*knows more about my affairs than any body else— you see I have made my arrangements as tho I expect to die, but I hope to see you all here next summer every man ought to make his will when in good health as all are liable to acc[iden]ts.*/p*
*p*I have written to *person_mentioned*Col. Piedras */person_mentioned*at *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*that you will be on—you must call and see him and shew your passport from me and report your *person_mentioned*servants*/person_mentioned*— Some have had the imprudence to tell him that they had *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned*— you must indenture them, do it before a *person_mentioned*magistrate*/person_mentioned*, or *person_mentioned*clerk of a court*/person_mentioned* or of [mutilated] *person_mentioned*witness */person_mentioned*let *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*be out . . . and others who are ... so that .. . —the contract here I think of [will] have no difficulty but be particular to call on *person_mentioned*Col Piedras*/person_mentioned* immediately on your arrival, get *person_mentioned*John Durst as interpreter*/person_mentioned* or some other*person_mentioned*—Col Bean*/person_mentioned* [if he] is there—or *person_mentioned*Sterne*/person_mentioned*- the last person named is the best, tho any of them will do, they all understand Spanish*/p*—
*p*I leave *date_mentioned n="12-19-1830">this day*/date_mentioned* for *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*and do not expect to be back before *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1831">June*/date_mentioned*, and to that time I look forward with great anxiety as the period of meeting you all once more*/p*
*p*The note you sent me on *person_mentioned*Sims */person_mentioned*is in the *location_mentioned*bottom of my red trunk */location_mentioned*in one of your letters— farewell may heaven bless you and *person_mentioned*Emily*/person_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*Children */person_mentioned*and give you a safe and pleasant journey here*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*If you come by *location_mentioned*Little Rock*/location_mentioned* get *person_mentioned*Father*/person_mentioned*s writing desk I want it because it was his*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. A*/person_mentioned*.*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr James Perry */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned* Potosi Missouri*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
